name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:**  Involvement of or extension to bone includes any type of tumor extension to the bone, such as erosion, invasion, extension, penetration, or destruction.
rows:
Localized only

    Invasive tumor confined to mucosa of maxillary antrum (sinus)

    Localized, NOS

Invasive tumor confined to mucosa of maxillary sinus (antrum) 
WITHOUT erosion or destruction of bone

Stated as T1

Regional by direct extension only

Extension to:
     Base of skull
     Cribriform plate
     Ethmoid, NOS
     Ethmoid sinus, anterior or posterior
     Floor or medial wall of orbit
     Floor or posterior wall of maxillary sinus
     Frontal sinus
     Infratemporal fossa
     Maxilla, NOS
     Middle nasal meatus
     Nasal cavity, NOS:
          Floor
          Lateral wall
          Septum
          Turbinates
     Nasopharynx
     Orbital contents including eye
     Palate, hard or soft
     Palatine bone
     Pterygoid plates
     Pterygomaxillary or temporal fossa
     Skin of cheek
     Sphenoid

Tumor causing bone erosion or destruction INCLUDING:
    Palatine bone, hard palate         
    Middle nasal meatus         
    Nasal cavity (floor, lateral wall, septum, turbinates)

Anterior orbital contents
Pterygoid fossa
Subcutaneous tissues

Further contiguous extension including:
    Brain
    Clivus
    Cranial nerves (other than V2, maxillary division of trigeminal nerve)
    Dura
    Middle cranial fossa
    Orbital apex

Stated as T2, T3, or T4 (T4a, T4b, [NOS])

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
